title: Lag Spikes
body: Normally I get pretty consistent fps (60), but recently I've been getting some frame drops from doing certain things like placing a ward down or doing a rakan ult combo.. Anyway to fix this?

replies.body: There might be some bad game files or assets that's causing fps drops when used.  Our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide has some steps to rule out possibilities, but running a repair through the client settings might just do the trick!  Let me know if you have any questions!
